name: Bomb Fuse Madness
description:
You're trapped in a facility with an experiment gone wrong! A huge bomb keeps creating fuses out of thin air, and there's no end to them! Try to delay the bomb from exploding for as long as you can.

Credits:

  • Fuse loop sound from https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/540829/, licensed under CC BY 4.0.
  • Music from Fupi (https://opengameart.org/content/glitch-stairs)
